description.en:
Corpus SPOOK contains recent novels in Slovene, either written in Slovene (slv) or translated into Slovene from English (eng), French (fra), German (ger) or Italian (ita). The originals of these novels are also a part of the corpus and are sentence aligned with Slovene. The words in the corpus are tagged by their lemmas and corpus tags, as defined in the Spook morphosyntactic specifications. The work on the corpus was supported by the Spook project.

This is the main interface. Individual subcorpora can be accessed from the subcorpora list bellow.
description.sl:
Korpus SPOOK vsebuje sodobne romane v slovenščini, bodisi izvirno napisane v slovenskem jeziku (slv) ali pa preveden vanj iz anglešćine (eng), francoščine (fra), nemščine (ger) ali italijanščine (ita). V korpusu so tudi izvirniki romanov, ki so stanvčno poravnani s prevodom. Besede v korpusih so označene z lemo in oblikoskladenjsko oznako, ki so za vse pet jezikov definirane v Spook morphosyntactic specifications. Delo na korpusu je bilo podprto s projektom SPOOK.

To je splošni vmesnik. Posamezni podkorpusi so na voljo v seznamu podkorpusov spodaj.
